dct_title_s: Charles Town, South Carolina, with a chart of the bars & harbour
dct_description_sm: Oriented with north to the right. Relief shown by hachures. Depths shown by soundings. From: Westminster magazine, June, 1780. Historic Maps copy accompanied by "Short description of Charles-Town, in South-Carolina ... illustrated by an engraved chart of the bars and harbour of Charles-Town," (p. 283-284), removed from the Westminster magazine.
